I can’t find any documentation on how to use the D-Pad on an Xbox controller. I want to look into using it for an elevator. Please help

THIS references the methods from CommandGenericHID. They provide “nice” names for the angles. Use GenericHID if you want angles in degrees.

import wpilib
controller = wpilib.XBoxController(0)
dpad = controller.getPOV()

The value of dpad will be an integer. 0 is up, 90 to the right, 180 down, and 270 is left.
